thread.title: WATCH: Tim Tebow shocks teen battling cancer with surprise visit

author: palmbeachpost
title: WATCH: Tim Tebow shocks teen battling cancer with surprise visit
text:
By HotTopics.tv
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. – A teen battling cancer was speechless when his favorite quarterback came to visit.
Video stills via Tim Tebow Foundation / Facebook A video posted to Facebook by the Tim Tebow Foundation shows Nathaniel Nelson, 13, decked out in Florida gear at Wolfson Children’s Hospital in Jacksonville, Florida. He was diagnosed with cancer in August.
>> Read more trending stories
The former University of Florida quarterback walked into the room and gave Nathaniel a big hug, bringing him to tears. For about a minute, Nathaniel couldn’t even speak.
Finally, at the end of the video, Nathaniel says, “Wow. Thank you for visiting me.”
“Of course,” Tebow says. “It’s my pleasure.”
>> Click here to watch the video
So AWESOME to watch Tim Tebow surprise our new friend Nathaniel at Wolfson Children's Hospital! What an incredible young man!
Posted by Tim Tebow Foundation on Tuesday, September 29, 2015
